A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible half baked script writing incorporating a silly 'Mary Sue' main character and full of political agenda which had no place being in the film. \nHonestly I am suspicious of the critics reviews on Rotten Tomatoes and the 'Tomatometer' score and that the real audience score is also well below 50% seeing how many half stars are being given.\nI've been looking forward to the upcoming Han Solo film but after seeing this terrible mess I don't feel like there's any point\, the franchise isn't safe in the hands of Kathleen Kennedy - if she wants to play politics then she should stand for election along with Rian Johnson!
